Body: I would like to know if it is possible to update my Samsung Galaxy S3, which is in 4.3 Jelly Bean, to 5.0-lollipop. And in this case, I would like to know :If it is a good idea ;Will my phone support it ; What benefits it might bring me if it is possible.I also would like to know the best way to proceed, to update my phone.Thank you in advance.  Edit : I have a friend that has the same phone, and his phone updated itself. Why not mine?
Title: Samsung galaxy S3 GT-I9300 4.3 Jelly Bean to 5.0-lollipop

history.Text: I would loke to know if it is possible to update my Samsung Galaxy S3, which is in 4.3 Jelly Bean, to 5.0-lollipop.
